Hello, I am Zixuan Z.
I graduated from Oregon State University as Master of Computer Science.
I currently work as Software Developer at EasyRent.
I currently work mostly on front end. I also had a little personal experience on Android.
Pascal brought me to programming world. But I am a fan of Java.
I prefer to considering user experience when design user interface. It is a interesting problem how to satisfy most people, specific when we design for mobile device.
Diversity of human bring lots of surprises.
And this a ticket to Mars!! I like space and I am glad one day I can fly to space by this way.
